description:
Now the whole Onigashima is ablaze. Chopper reunites with Nami while Sanji and the others are each trying to escape from the flames. However, Raizo who harbors a great regret from his past stands up to the fire with the help of Jimbei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kein Entkommen! – Die Hölle bildet sich auf Onigashima ab
No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima
Nulle part où fuir. Onigashima, enfer à ciel ouvert !
逃げ場なし! 地獄絵図の鬼ヶ島
